en-US.summary: Ask Movie Critic to give you movie ratings, give you an overview of a movie, or ask for movie suggestions.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Movie Critic to give me the rating for Justice League
Alexa, ask Movie Critic to recommend an action movie
Alexa, ask Movie Critic to tell me about Batman Begins
en-US.name: Movie Critic
en-US.description: Ask Movie Critic to give you movie ratings, give you an overview of a movie, or ask for movie suggestions.
